name: 52헤르츠
description:
You, who's had enough of getting old with nothing accomplished

It's been completely destroyed by an incident

We head to the coastal island village [Mangyeongdo] which is famous for its suicide attraction.





When I gave up everything and tried to throw myself into the sea

You meet a girl there by chance...




Starting from a quiet island village

You and her story.



Will they be happy again?






- 3~4 hours of play time / Visual noble
